languages.text: "Род Зауэрбэк веками служил династии Вольных Торговцев фон Валанциус. Мы никогда не давали повода усомниться в нашей верности".

traits.locale_text: "Род Зауэрбек веками служил династии Вольных Торговцев фон Воланциус. Мы никогда не давали повода усомниться в нашей верности".

languages.text: "House Sauerback has faithfully served the von Valancius dynasty of Rogue Traders. We have never given anyone cause to doubt our loyalty."
languages.original_text: "Род Зауэрбэк веками служил династии Вольных Торговцев фон Валанциус. Мы никогда не давали повода усомниться в нашей верности".

traits.locale_text: "House Sauerback had faithfully served the von Valancius dynasty of Rogue Traders. Our loyalty stands beyond question."
"House Sauerback had faithfully served the von Valancius dynasty of Rogue Traders. Our loyalty stands beyond question."
"House Sauerback has faithfully served the von Valancius dynasty of Rogue Traders. Our loyalty stands beyond question."

"House Sauerback has faithfully served the von Valancius dynasty of Rogue Traders. We have never given anyone cause to doubt our loyalty."
"House Sauerback has faithfully served the von Valancius dynasty of Rogue Traders. We have never given anyone cause to doubt our loyalty."

languages.text: 「ザウアーバック家は自由開拓者を擁するフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に忠実に使えてきました。私たちの忠誠に疑問の余地などありません」
languages.original_text: "House Sauerback has faithfully served the von Valancius dynasty of Rogue Traders. We have never given anyone cause to doubt our loyalty."

traits.locale_text: 「ザウアーバック家は自由開拓者を擁するフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に忠実に使えてきました。私たちの忠誠に疑問の余地などありません」

languages.text: “苏尔贝克家族全心全意侍奉行商浪人冯·瓦兰修斯的王朝。我们从来没做过任何可耻的事情，我们的忠诚毋庸置疑。”
languages.original_text: "House Sauerback has faithfully served the von Valancius dynasty of Rogue Traders. We have never given anyone cause to doubt our loyalty."

traits.locale_text: “苏尔贝克家族全心全意侍奉行商浪人冯·瓦兰修斯的王朝。我们从来没做过任何可耻的事情，我们的忠诚毋庸置疑。”

languages.text: « La maison Sauerback a toujours fidèlement servi la dynastie des libres-marchands von Valancius. Nous n'avons jamais rien fait qui puisse remettre en cause notre loyauté. »
languages.original_text: "House Sauerback has faithfully served the von Valancius dynasty of Rogue Traders. We have never given anyone cause to doubt our loyalty."

traits.locale_text: « La maison Sauerback a toujours fidèlement servi la dynastie des libres-marchands von Valancius. Nous n'avons jamais rien fait qui puisse remettre en cause notre loyauté. »

languages.text: «La casa Sauerback ha servido a la dinastía von Valancius fielmente. Nunca hemos dado motivos a nadie para dudar de nuestra lealtad».
languages.original_text: "House Sauerback has faithfully served the von Valancius dynasty of Rogue Traders. We have never given anyone cause to doubt our loyalty."

traits.locale_text: «La casa Sauerback ha servido a la dinastía von Valancius fielmente. Nunca hemos dado motivos a nadie para dudar de nuestra lealtad».

languages.text: "Haus Sauerback hat der Freihändlerdynastie derer von Valancius stets treu gedient. Wir haben nie jemandem einen Grund gegeben, an unserer Loyalität zu zweifeln."
languages.original_text: "House Sauerback has faithfully served the von Valancius dynasty of Rogue Traders. We have never given anyone cause to doubt our loyalty."

traits.locale_text: "Haus Sauerback dient der Freihändlerdynastie derer von Valancius vollkommen treu. An unserer Loyalität kann es keinen Zweifel geben."

languages.text: "Sauerback Hanesi, von Valancius Hür Tacir hanedanlığına yürekten hizmet etmiştir ve hâlâ etmektedir. Sadakatimizi sorgulatacak hiçbir şey yapmadık."
languages.original_text: "House Sauerback has faithfully served the von Valancius dynasty of Rogue Traders. We have never given anyone cause to doubt our loyalty."

traits.locale_text: "Sauerback hanesi, von Valancius Hür Tacir hanedanlığına yürekten hizmet etmiş ve etmektedir. Sadakatimizi sorgulatacak hiçbir şey yapmadık."
